text: Front area is a complete storage area for junk. No price list, it looks like they make it up according to who is ordering. I bought a small oxtail and rice and it was nearly $12. I could not stay and eat because the A/C was not on and it was like an oven inside. Food was bland...no love. Would not be going back to here again.

The bomb jerk chicken.
Authentic Jamaican food. 
Only negative is they should be open longer on weeknights and Sunday.
I can't say enough about this hidden gem. The food is fantastic and the service is very friendly.
